duties_responsibilities.duty: Enter citation data into Harris County Odyssey Case Management System.
Communicate effectively with customers on cases and offer solutions.
Answer phones and direct calls where appropriate.
Perform data entry for case events, schedule court dates, and generate/send court notices.
Handle and balance money as part of cashier duties.
Perform other duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or G.E.D. equivalent from an accredited educational institution.
Two years or more of clerical or customer service work experience.
